articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: India to surpass Japan, be second largest Asian economy by 2030: S&P Global - Business Standard
articles.description: India, the world's fifth largest economy in the world, is likely to overtake Japan to become the world's third-largest economy with a GDP of USD 7.3 trillion by 2030, S&P Global Market Intelligence said in its latest issue of PMI.
articles.content:
After two years of rapid economic growth in 2021 and 2022, the Indian economy has continued to show sustained strong growth during the 2023 calendar year
Photo: Bloomberg
